venue.address_1: Boston Common (outside the Park Street T Station at Park and Tremont streets)
venue.name: Boston Common (outside the Park Street T Station at Park and Tremont streets)

item.description:
Enjoy a leisurely Sunday ride along the Emerald Necklace from the Boston Common to Franklin Park, the way Olmsted intended, as Laurie Pessah from Toole Design Group discusses the ins and outs of the Boston Bicycle Master Plan along the way. This seven-mile ride, largely along dedicated paths, will have intermittent stops for discussion.

Registration is recommended.
item.name: COMMON BOSTON - Ride the Necklace
